Onslaught enemies will now appear. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.
Onslaught enemies will no longer appear.
Challenge modifiers will now be applied. Soul gain and Item Discovery increased.
Challenge modifiers will no longer be reduced.

Curses are modifiers that you may apply to yourself in exchange for a bonus.
Once enabled, a curse is applied after you rest at a bonfire, and will remain active until you disabled it at the Accursed Altar.

Enemies recover 100 stamina per second.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Enemies are attracted to your scent.
Additional enemies appear throughout the world.
Boosts soul absorption by 5%.

You are blind to danger. Literally.
You are now shrouded by darkness.
Boosts soul absorption by 15%.

Your mind is fogged with confusion.
You no longer regenerate FP passively.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your gluttony has slowed your senses.
Doubles swing and evasive stamina consumption.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your strikes are pitiful and frail.
Enemies are virtually impossible to stagger.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

Your body is enfeebled by unholy magic.
Your max HP, FP and Stamina is reduced by 50%.
Boosts soul absorption by 15%.

Your weapons easily crumble.
The durability of your weapons will gradually degrade over time.
Boosts soul absorption by 10%.

The glorious kneel before no hollow.
Empowers bosses, increasing the following: - Damage by 50%. - HP by 30%. - Stamina by 30%. - Stamina recovery by 30. - Poise by 100. - Resistances by 50%.
Enables an additional chance for a Primordial Fragment.

Give the Blood of the Dark Soul

Lethal: reduces weapon stamina consumption by 15%. Magic: absorb 2/4/6 FP on hit, differs based on weapon type. Fire: apply stacking 1% Fire absorption debuff for 5 seconds. Lightning: apply 50% Poise debuff to target for 5 seconds. Dark: absorb 5/10/15 HP on hit, differs based on weapon type. Lucky: Increases Item Discovery by 25 and soul absorption by 10%. Enchanted: restores an additional 3 FP per second. Holy: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Sharp: consecutive attacks boost damage, up to 15%. Blunt: increases max equipment load by 10%.

Clarity: restores an additional 3 FP per second. Rejuvenation: grants an additional 15 stamina recovery. Restoration: restores an additional 3 HP per second. Respite: increases max equipment load by 10%. Lucidity: reduces spell FP consumption by 5%. Greed: increases soul absorption by 10%. Magic: increases Magic absorption by 5%. Fire: increases Fire absorption by 5%. Lightning: increases Lightning absorption by 5%. Dark: increases Dark absorption by 5%.

Pulsating: restores an additional 5 FP per second. Vibrating: restores an additional 5 HP per second. Throbbing: reduces FP cost of all spells by 10%. Quivering: boosts cast speed by 25. Laughing: converts the catalyst into Luck form: - Halves the INT and FTH required for spells. - Switches the catalyst scaling to LCK.
Reinforcement is no longer present. All weapons are inherently more powerful. A weapon's power is released by increasing STR, DEX, INT, FTH or LCK.

You are marked, drawing creatures towards your location.
Adds additional enemies throughout the world.

You do not possess this ring

Affixes are used to empower accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Primordial Fragments, with each level of affixing requiring more.
Basic: 2 Primordial Fragments Fine: 4 Primordial Fragments Superior: 6 Primordial Fragments Exquisite: 8 Primordial Fragments Legendary: 10 Primordial Fragments
Ring of the Sun's First Born
You do not possess this offering

Imbuement is used to empower companion accessories, increasing the strength of their effects.
This process requires Ritual Incense, with each level of imbuement requiring more.
Basic: 3 Ritual Incense Fine: 6 Ritual Incense Superior: 9 Ritual Incense Exquisite: 12 Ritual Incense Legendary: 15 Ritual Incense
